publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2283 Mr Ted Brocklebank:60th Anniversary of the Liberation of Auschwitz—That the Parliament recognises the suffering of all those who died at the Nazis’ hands in Auschwitz, which was liberated by Allied troops 60 years ago this month, and particularly recognises, and pays tribute to, the courage and fortitude of the survivors of Auschwitz, including Zoë Polanska Palmer of Broughty Ferry, whose story of personal survival against all the odds is told in her autobiography, Yalta Victim.

S2M-2283 60th Anniversary of the Liberation of Auschwitz (lodged on 20 January 2005) Murdo Fraser*, Fergus Ewing*, Mr David Davidson*, Mark Ballard*, Phil Gallie*, Robin Harper*, Fiona Hyslop*, Richard Lochhead*, Kate Maclean*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Alex Neil*, Tommy Sheridan*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Shona Robison*, Karen Gillon*, Mr Mark Ruskell*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Bill Aitken*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Eleanor Scott*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mike Pringle*

S2M-2283 60th Anniversary of the Liberation of Auschwitz (lodged on 20 January 2005) Mr Jamie McGrigor*, Dr Jean Turner*, Frances Curran*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Michael Matheson*, Christine Grahame*
S2M-2283 60th Anniversary of the Liberation of Auschwitz (lodged on 20 January 2005) John Swinburne*, Rosie Kane*
S2M-2283 60th Anniversary of the Liberation of Auschwitz (lodged on 20 January 2005) Roseanna Cunningham*, Mr Brian Monteith*
S2M-2283 60th Anniversary of the Liberation of Auschwitz (lodged on 20 January 2005) Pauline McNeill*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-2283 60th Anniversary of the Liberation of Auschwitz (lodged on 20 January 2005) Elaine Smith*
S2M-2283 60th Anniversary of the Liberation of Auschwitz (lodged on 20 January 2005) Mr John Home Robertson*
